1.name: Forest Clearing
1.description: A beginner-friendly zone with weak goblins. Recommended for levels 1-5.

2.name: Mountain Path
2.description: Rugged terrain with trolls. Recommended for levels 5-10.

3.name: Hidden Old Church
3.description: An old hidden away church filled with the undead.

4.name: Dragon's Lair
4.description: Dangerous caves with dragons and tougher foes. Recommended for levels 10+.
